ShadowSiege_PlayerEntersCombat.synopsis: SCL Haven: Isobel is kidnapped/killed and shadows engulf the inn, combat starts against the shadows. Players find themselves in the middle of it protecting the inn or just because they haven't escaped.
ShadowSiege_PlayerEntersCombat.how_to_trigger: Enter Haven (Last Light). Use debug book command "Set quest flags" -> Act2 -> Haven -> Siege -> Start Siege right awayOREnter Haven, go to Isobel room, kill Isobel (can kill marcus too).
